name: We Need To Talk (Doot, dorirandri)
description:
*Warning: the game contains flashing animations*

I need to tell you something important...🔥

Try to avoid the conversation!

Use every move you got and every answer you can find to delay these - you assume - terrible news!

Controls ⌨️  

Play with your keyboard!

- Arrow keys to play cards  
- Spacebar to trigger ultimate

Credits 👩🏽‍❤️‍👨🏼  

Doriane Randria (@blibloop)    
Dorian Signargout (@doot)  

Audio
